entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
